content.rendered:
Directed by Dan Kwan. Daniel Scheinert

Written by Dan Kwan. Daniel Scheinert

Star Michelle Yeoh(Evelyn Wang). Stephanie Hsu(Joy Wang / Jobu Tupaki). Ke Huy Quan(Waymond Wang). James Hong(Gong Gong). Jamie Lee Curtis(Deirdre Beaubeirdre). Tallie Medel(Becky Sregor). Jenny Slate(Debbie the Dog Mom). Harry Shum Jr.(Chad). Randy Newman(Raccacoonie (voice)). Biff Wiff(Rick). Sunita Mani(TV Musical – Queen). Aaron Lazar(TV Musical – Soldier). Brian Le(Alpha Jumper – Trophy). Andy Le(Alpha Jumper – Bigger Trophy). Narayana Cabral(Security Guard (as Neravana Cabral)). Chelsey Goldsmith(Security Guard). Craig Henningsen(Security Guard). Anthony Molinari(Police – Confetti). Dan Brown(Police – Salsa). Panuvat Anthony Nanakornpanom(Police – Luchador (as Anthony Nanakornpanom)). Cara Marie Chooljian(Alpha Jumper – Jogger). Randall Archer(Alpha Jumper – Edgelord). Efka Kvaraciejus(Alpha Jumper – SWAT). Peter Banifaz(Alpha RV Officer). Audrey Wasilewski(Alpha RV Officer). Li Jing(Kung Fu Master). Dylan Henry Lau(Young Boy Waymond (as Dylan Lau)). Peter Boon Koh(Maternity Doctor (as Boon Koh)). Timothy Eulich(Laundromat Police). Daniel Scheinert(District Manager). Michiko Nishiwaki(Kung Fu Competitor / Co-Star). Jane Lui(Opera Evelyn (voice)). Jason Hanmer(Raccacoonie Puppeteer (as Jason Hamer)). Timothy Scott Ralston(Raccacoonie Puppeteer (as Timothy Ralston)). Hiroshi Yada(Raccacoonie Puppeteer). Elle Alexander(Lunch Lady (uncredited)). Emmett Ferguson(Movie Theater Goer (uncredited)). Freya Fox(Mei Li (uncredited)). Waymond Lee(Chinese Choir / Movie Producer (uncredited)). Amanda MacLeod(Dominatrix (uncredited)). Pablo Ramos(Pedestrian (uncredited)). D.Y. Sao(Chinese Choir (uncredited))

Language English. Mandarin. Cantonese

Producers Allison Rose Carter. Sarah Finn. Tim Headington. Dan Kwan. Mike Larocca. Todd Makurath. Theresa Steele Page. Jon Read. Josh Rudnick. Anthony Russo. Joe Russo. Daniel Scheinert. Jonathan Wang. Michelle Yeoh

Production A24. AGBO Production. Hotdog Hands
